Killfest's group is en route to Megatron's base, Robo. Your troops 
are going to have to catch up.

::Killfest/Scyther/Demise/EndBringer/Greven/DarkMouse/Goldeneye::

Killfest nods. "Agreed. Let's go."

He walks out of the room and passes the order on to DarkMouse over 
his comm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise looks up at the mountain that he, EndBringer, and Scyther were 
standing in front. They were gonna have to scale it. That was no 
tough job, but it did waste some time.

"Do you think anyone will escape?" EndBringer asks the other two 
members of the group as he begins the climb, his voice tinged with 
insanity. Demise was climbing to his right, and Scyther, even though 
he was cloaked and couldn't be seen, was on his left.

"I certainly hope so," the beast-bot, Demise, replies in his raspy 
voice, digging a giant claw into the mountainside and pushing himself 
up, "There isn't enough battle on this planet, and they tell us its a 
war."

EndBringer grunts in reply as his foot sends some rocks rolling down 
the side of the mountain. "I agree with you there. I havn't friend 
anyone in ages. What do you think, Scyther?"

Silence answered EndBringer's question. He grunts. He didn't like how 
Scyther was so anti-social. EndBringer might be an insane killer, but 
he had no problems with conversation.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DarkMouse stands up, smiling at Goldeneye as Killfest's order comes 
through. "Lets get to the bridge, we got work to do!"

She runs out of the room and runs off toward the bridge with 
Goldeneye following her.

> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Well Killfest, I guess we'll have to get things back to a normal 
rutine

shifts."
> A big smile appeared on his face.
> "As for us, lets go to the bridge; and try out that command chair.
> Hehe."
>
